title: Wellington CEO on ‘Big Foray' Into Private Markets
description: Jean Hynes, CEO of Wellington Management, discusses investment strategy and the growing role of private assets in portfolios with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” She says the firm believes it has a “real edge” in its investments. (Source: Bloomberg)
